pages.text: Ate sada hukama basa acanaka a javega jivem akha da jhapakana
Ate asim nasata kara cuke ham tuhade nala vali'am nu phira ki ko'i hai socana vala
Ate jihara kujha unham ne kita sabha kitabam vica likhi'a ho'i'a hai
Ate hareka choti vadi gala likhi ho'i hai
Besaka dara rakhana vale bagam ate nahiram vica honage
Uha saci baithaka vica baithe honage samaratha patasaha de kola
Rahimana (da'i'avana) ne
Kura'ana di sikhi'a diti
Usa ne manukha nu paida kita
Usa nu bolana sikha'i'a
Suraja ate cada de la'i ika hisasa hai
Ate tare te darakhata sijada karade hana
Ate usa ne akasa nu uci'am kita ate takari rakha diti
Ki tusim tolana vica pharaka na karo
Ate inasafa de nala thika tolo ate tola vica garabari na karom
ate usa ne dharati nu khalakata la'i rakha dita
Isa vica meve hana ate khajuram hana, jinham upara khola (galapha) huda hai
Ate turi vala anaja vi ate sugadhi vale phula vi
Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karoge
Usa ne manukha nu thikari varagi suki miti tom paida kita
Ate usa ne jinam nu aga di'am lapatam tom paida kita
Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karoge
